component.name: Flemozi
component.summary: Advanced⚡ Emoji Picker😀 for Linux🐧, Windows🪟 and macOS🍎

description.p: A simple✨, fast⚡ and lightweight🪶 emoji picker for desktop operating systems🫶 Available for Linux🐧, Windows🪟 and macOS🍎.

ul.li: Configurable Global🪩 shortcut🩳✂️ to open the emoji picker
Launches on system startup, runs in the background and can invoked from anywhere👻
Supports GIFs📼, stickers🎟️ and ASCII emojis👴 too
Copies the selected emoji to the clipboard📋 and automatically closes the picker obviously🤦‍♂️
